pullrequest.title: Change minibatch to use numpy.random.choice to avoid need to seed two different RNGs

content.raw: I just remembered there should be a `NEWS` section. If minibatch is already in the released version, should describe the change. If not, should add a thanks to Rachel in the `NEWS` next to the minibatch addition.
content.html: I just remembered there should be a NEWS section. If minibatch is already in the released version, should describe the change. If not, should add a thanks to Rachel in the NEWS next to the minibatch addition.
